Address.value: 1345 AVENUE OF THE AMERICAS,45TH FLOOR,45TH FLOOR, NEW YORK, New York, 10105, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Fortress Transportation and Infrastructure Investors LLC is an infrastructure and equipment leasing company based in the United States. The company's reportable segments are Aviation Leasing, Jefferson Terminal, Ports and Terminals, Transtar, Corporate and Other. Aviation Leasing consists of aircraft and aircraft engines and generates the majority of revenue for the company. Geographically, it derives a majority of revenue from North America.
